title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8008.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8008.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part, in conjunction with section
8000.5
of this Subtitle, shall
govern the privacy of case records in addition to delineating the procedures
governing the availability, location and nature of those records of the
division releasable to the public pursuant to Article 6 of the Public Officers

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8008.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
